title: Set alias for columns in dataset does not reflect in expression builder
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are shown instead of the alias names that were set for the columns in the dataset.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The column names displayed should reflect the aliases set for the columns in the dataset.
